revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lost Hotel |image = [[File:Lost Hotel.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Lost Hotel. |tokens = 635,000 |location = West of Route 15. }} '''Lost Hotel''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 8,375,300 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == ===Rencontres sauvages===
